summary: Successfully restored complete authentication system and added mandatory onboarding registration module. Users must now sign in with Google, then complete a registration form (name, phone, company, terms) before accessing the market intelligence platform. Data is stored in localStorage and the flow is fully gated.
current_status: Complete authentication + onboarding system implemented. Users experience: Google sign-in → Registration form → Main app access. All files restored and system is functional with beautiful UI components.
